content.rendered:
Directed by Nelson Dilipkumar.

Written by Nelson Dilipkumar.

Cast Nayanthara(Kokila). Saranya Ponvannan(Kokila’s Mother). Saravanan(Inspector Guru). Yogi Babu(Sekar). Motta Rajendran(Alphonse (as Rajendran)). Hareesh Peradi(Bhai). R.S. Shivaji(Kokila’s father).Cheenu Mohan. Charles Vinoth(Mohan). Arun Alexander(Bobi).Billy Muralee. Anbu Thasan(Lakshman Kumar LK). Aranthangi Nisha((as Arandhangi Nisha)).Srilekha Parthasarathy.Theepetti Ganesan.Redgiant Subramani.Pillayar Ruthru.Augustin.Kalaiarasan.Vadivel Balaji. Redin Kingsley((as Redin Kingselly)).Shiva Aravind.Anand . Jacqueline Fernandas(Shobi / Kokila’s sister). Kunju Ravi(Tony)

Language Tamil.

Producers Nish Niruthan. A. Subaskaran.

Production Lyca Productions.
